casebody.data:
PENNA RD CO et v P U C COLUMBUS & ZANESVILLE TRANSP. CO v P U C RED EAGLE BUS CO et v P U C CINCINNATI & LAKE ERIE RD CO v P U C PENNA GENERAL TRANSIT CO v PU C Ohio Supreme Court Nos 22739, 22754, 22755, 22756 and 22757. Decided May 20, 1931

For full opinion see 123 Oh St 655 (Oh Bar 6-30-31).
